column3: Be careful. You'll hurt yourself {{c1::if}} you fall.
I'm going away for a few days. I'll call you {{c1::when}} I get back.
I'm going shopping. {{c1::If}} you want anything, I can get it for you.
I hope Sarah can come to the party. It will be a shame {{c1::if}} she can't come.
I'm watching a programme on TV right now. {{c1::When}} it finishes, I'm going out.
{{c1::If}} I don't see you tomorrow, when will I see you again?
We can eat at home or, {{c1::if}} you prefer, we can go to a restaurant.

A: I'm going to Rome next week.
B: That's nice. What are you going to do {{c1::when}} you're there?
